text: gei goe ga haga modongoohia gi digaula bolo ma ko Au, go Tagi go Yihowah, gaa daa di baahi laubaba dela e haga modongoohia bolo Israel, ga nneennagi gi di baahi laubaba dela e haga modongoohia bolo Judah. Malaa, nia baahi laubaba e lua aanei gaa kumi ko Au gi di gowaa e dahi, gaa hai di baahi laubaba hua e dahi, ga daahi ko Au gi dogu lima.
